subject: Crypto News. July 3, 2025
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-3-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, Nano Labs, Ondo Finance.
Live on YouTube:
https://youtube.com/shorts/khRhF5XM6os [ https://substack.com/redirect/54582779-7056-489c-9033-0fab37d74892?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Thanks for reading! Subscribe for free to receive new posts and support my work.
Please subscribe.
DeFi
JD . com and Ant Group are reportedly lobbying China’s central bank to approve yuan-based stablecoins for use in Hong Kong.
Amber International has raised $25.5 million from investors including Pantera Capital to grow its $100 million crypto reserve, which holds Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, BNB, XRP, and SUI. The funds will support projects focused on tokenization and AgentFi.
Nano Labs bought 74,315 BNB for $50 million via OTC, boosting its crypto reserves to $160 million as it aims to hold up to 10% of BNB’s supply alongside 1,000 BTC.
Ondo Finance and Pantera Capital plan to invest $250M in RWA projects, targeting both equity stakes and project tokens.
